## DMart Hyderabad – Kitchen Appliances & FMCG Supply Proposal
*Date: October 26, 2023*

## Executive Summary
Thank you for your interest in our product range. Based on your request for DMart Hyderabad, we have curated a selection of high-performance kitchen appliances and essential FMCG items designed to meet your quantity requirements and customer demand. This proposal outlines our competitive offerings and terms for a successful partnership.

## Solution Overview (SKU Mapping)

| Requirement | Proposed SKU | Qty |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| High-Capacity Microwave Ovens | ProChef 28L Convection Microwave | 150 |
| Versatile Mixer Grinders | PowerBlend 750W Mixer Grinder | 200 |
| Energy-Efficient Induction Cooktops | EcoHeat Single Burner Induction | 100 |
| Premium Cooking Oil (5L) | HarvestGold Refined Sunflower Oil | 500 |
| Assorted Packaged Snacks (100g) | SnackCraze Variety Pack (Case of 24) | 300 |
| High-Performance Detergent (2kg) | SparkleWash Advanced Detergent | 400 |

*Note: The ProChef Microwave offers advanced convection features and a larger capacity than standard models, providing superior value for your customers.*

## Commercial Summary
- **Subtotal**: ₹1,850,000.00
- **Taxes (GST)**: ₹333,000.00
- **Total Proposal Value**: ₹2,183,000.00

## Terms & Conditions
- **Warranty**: Standard 2-Year Comprehensive Warranty on all appliances.
- **Delivery**: Dispatch within 3-5 business days post-PO.
- **Payment**: Net 30 Days.

## Closing
We look forward to partnering with DMart Hyderabad and are confident that our product range will significantly contribute to your sales success. Please sign this proposal to initiate the order.
